title: Too Soon To Brag?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and David Jacoby debate if Joe Lacob is getting ahead of himself by bragging about the Warriors not trading their young assets for a win-now player and if they see Aaron Donald actually retiring if he doesn’t get paid.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Should The Warriors Be Bragging About Not Trading Away Their Youth?
